subject: Re: [junit] Unit Testing Frameworks for Mobile Devices, like Symbian and Windows Mobile based.
msgSnippet: Kamal, I didn t know of any that work globally, but there are solutions for several of the individual platforms.  Did you find what you were looking for? David
messageBody:
Kamal,

I didn't know of any that work globally, but there are solutions for
several of the individual platforms. Did you find what you were
looking for?

David Saff

On Wed, Aug 6, 2008 at 2:55 PM, Kamal Ahmed <kamal2222ahmed@...> wrote:
> Hi,
> This is a bit off topic, but could anyone tell me a JUnit like framework for
> Mobile Devices.
> The ones that i am coming across are simple too difficult to implement, and
> use.
> like:
>
> * CppUnit
> * Boost.Test
> * CppUnitLite
> * NanoCppUnit
> * Unit++
> * CxxTestThanks,
> -Kamal.
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
